TimerMsgsList.Title: Restart Hours Announcer
TimerMsgsList.Message: This server restarts at 1:00 AM daily.

TimerMsgsList.Title: Stay Hydrated Reminder
TimerMsgsList.Message: Make sure you always have a glass of water nearby!

TimerMsgsList.Title: Cats Are Nice Reminder
TimerMsgsList.Message:
Little thought for today:
I meant, said Ipslore bitterly,
What is there in this world that truly makes living worthwhile?
Death thought about it.
CATS, he said eventually.
CATS ARE NICE.
